All,

Thanks. I got the translation help I needed.
Much appreciated, as I recieved several offers of
help.

That said, I was slightly embarrassed, as it turned
out to be rather simple. Should have been able to get
it myself. Sideorder of humility with my morning
coffee.

Respectfully,

Curran
